name: WP Page Extension
author: Daddy Design

sections.description:
Converting an old HTML, PHP, or ASP site to WordPress? WP Page Extension will let you create pages inside of wordpress and give them any extension you want. It will help your site never lose any old backlinks and seo. You can choose any page to have any extension. Choices are: .html, .htm, .php, .xml, .shtml and .asp. If you dont pick an extension then it will just default to no extension.

Plugin Created By Daddy Design.

For support or comments please go here.

Our Other Plugins

  1. Social Toolbar

  2. Javascript Detect

  3. WP Report Error
    For support or comments please go here.

Demo’s

  1. Demo Page with a .htm extension
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-page-extension to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Edit whatever page you want an extension on
sections.faq:
Will this work for Post?

NO, this plugin only works for pages.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed Bug. Was having issues with category permilinks but it’s all fixed now.
  • Add .shtml extension.

1.0

  • Version 1.0 First Launch.
